document.heading: OFFICE ON EX-OFFENDER AFFAIRS AND COMMISSION ON RE-ENTRY AND EX-OFFENDER AFFAIRS ESTABLISHMENT ACT OF 2006

history.narrative: Law 16-243, the “Office on Ex-Offender Affairs and Commission on Re-entry and Ex-Offender Affairs Establishment Act of 2006”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 16-910, which was referred to Committee on Government Operations. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on November 14, 2006, and December 5, 2006, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 28 2006, it was assigned Act No. 16-599 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 16-243 became effective on March 8, 2007.
